datoCmsKey.name: Kat Griffin
datoCmsKey.bio: Kat (they/she/he) is a Nonbinary NYC based performer & photographer. A classically trained actor with a fierce voice- Kat is a proud member of Actors Equity & is represented by Clear Talent Group. Visit Kat’s website for their full resume, photography information, performance videos, current/upcoming projects, as well as more information about Kat’s own identity & casting/working with Trans Actors.
